subject: Set Current Working Directory for JUnit 3.8 Tests
msgSnippet: Hi All, The classes that my JUnit test class tests loads external files. These files can only be referred to using relative paths in the code to maintain
messageBody:
Hi All,

The classes that my JUnit test class tests loads external files. These
files can only be referred to using relative paths in the code to
maintain platform portability.

I tried to set the working directory in th Eclipse run configuration
dialog but that doesn't seem to do anything.

I am also invoking these tests using an Ant script.

Can anyone help me find out how to set this up?
